alert.note: Alert for Live Oak; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 12:19AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Simmons, or 14 miles west of George West, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Choke Canyon, Calliham and Simmons. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 622 and 628. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
